sentences.en: A balance is achieved in the painting between orderliness and unpredictability.
sentences.cn: 这幅画作在条理分明和出人意表之间取得了平衡。

sentences.en: An improved jumper and more unpredictability attacking the basket will help.
sentences.cn: 改善不少的跳投和更多不可预测的突破得分会有帮助的.

sentences.en: As its unpredictability, multiple ovulation and embryo transfer ( MOET ) have not used widely.
sentences.cn: 由于结果具有不可预见性,超数排卵和胚胎移植 ( MOET ) 使用的并不十分广泛.

sentences.en: But sexual attraction is based on spontaneity, unpredictability and, to Obama point, a little mystery.
sentences.cn: 但是性的吸引力却是自发的 、 不可预见的, 对于奥巴马来说, 也有些许的神秘.

sentences.en: But the only thing predictable about life is its unpredictability.
sentences.cn: 对于人生而言,我们唯一可以预知的,就是其不可预知性.

sentences.en: Choosing a younger successor would carry a higher degree of uncertainly of unpredictability.
sentences.cn: 选择一位较年轻的继承人,会有更高的不稳定性和不可预测性.

sentences.en: In other words, the distribution of unpredictability is not uniform throughout systems.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 不可预测性在整个系统中的分布并不是统一的.

sentences.en: Law 12 Keep others in suspended terror: Cultivate an air of unpredictability.
sentences.cn: 规则12》让他们停留在恐惧中: 营造一种不可预测的气氛.

sentences.en: Litigation is less suited to fixed fees, however, becauseof its unpredictability.
sentences.cn: 然而需要争讼的案件,由于其不可预测性, 则不太适合固定收费.

sentences.en: The clone would go through childhood and adolescence with the same life - shaping unpredictability as any kid.
sentences.cn: 这一无性繁殖系的个体将经历儿童时代和青春期,像普通小孩一样生活,成长而不可预测.

sentences.en: The danger lies in its unpredictability. Yet that may also be a reason for hope.
sentences.cn: 危险就在于其不可预测性，而这也可能是希望尚存的一个原因吧。

sentences.en: THE HOSTESS: It'strikes me that the route of a cult film is often its unpredictability.
sentences.cn: 主持人: 邪典电影给我留下的深刻印象是其故事情节总是非常出人意料.

sentences.en: The only thing predictable about life is its unpredictability!
sentences.cn: 人生中唯一能预知的就是世事难料!

sentences.en: We forget about unpredictability when it is our turn to predict, and overestimate our own knowledge.
sentences.cn: 当我们做出预测时,总会忘记不可预测性, 高估自己的知识能力.

sentences.en: While the West views democracy as an advantage since it can offer United States an institutional and bloodless process for renewal, Beijing views it as a source of irrationality and unpredictability.
sentences.cn: 尽管西方认为民主是一种优势，可以给美国提供一种制度上的、不流血的更新进程，但北京认为这是非理性和不可预测性的一个源头。

sentences.en: With the unpredictability of the volcano, authorities widened the danger zone around the mountain to 20 kilometers.
sentences.cn: 鉴于这一火山的不可预测性，印尼官员将“危险区域”扩大到方圆20公里。

words.tran_cn: 不可预知的；不定的；出乎意料的
无法预言地）；不可预见地（不能预料地

trans.tran_cn: 不可预测性，不可预知性
